item.title: Denim Care Tips
item.description: Denim is a versatile and durable fabric that is a staple in many wardrobes. However, if you don’t take proper care of your denim jeans, they can lose their shape, fade, and wear out more quickly.

item.title: Hello world
item.description: Alpha Array is born! We start selling officially in amazon.in. “The public is more familiar with bad design than good design. It is, in effect, conditioned to prefer bad design, because that is what it lives with.
